data.text: @2012_suzy @DennisKendel @AyishaKurji @SMA_docs @SaskFamilyDocs @SaskHealth @WaskoDr Just wondering Wht her name is??
@sueyangel @DennisKendel @AyishaKurji @SMA_docs @SaskFamilyDocs @SaskHealth @WaskoDr A very good female family GP

@DennisKendel @SMA_docs @SaskFamilyDocs @SaskHealth @WaskoDr This doctor has had a number of issues. It’s not only COVID. She didn’t pay her bills and the mgmt firm she used closed the building a couple yrs ago. She over prescribed opioids. She was a good doctor 10 years ago. Not so much last few years https://t.co/doIBhZ2Nwd

@GreyCupBound @DennisKendel @SMA_docs @SaskFamilyDocs @SaskHealth @WaskoDr What are the odds Telus Health swoops in vs becoming a public health owned clinic?

Would be great if healthcare had more federal involvement & a standard existed for how many clinics need to be publicly owned vs privately owned.

@DennisKendel @SMA_docs @SaskFamilyDocs @SaskHealth @WaskoDr Yes Covid took a toll but there is far more at play here. She is (was) my doctor. I’m sad to see her leave but I’m not the least bit surprised.

@Ottawaherenow @DennisKendel @SMA_docs @SaskFamilyDocs @SaskHealth @WaskoDr My apologies. Yes she was in fact going to be practicing medicine, but chose to change location to be closer to family. Meant no disrespect.
@MarD306 @DennisKendel @SMA_docs @SaskFamilyDocs @SaskHealth @WaskoDr Is it possible she went to Ontario not just to be close to her family but also to practice medicine?

@DennisKendel @SMA_docs @SaskFamilyDocs @SaskHealth @WaskoDr This is so unfortunate but I understand the physicians’ feelings and perspective. My family physician is leaving in May and I’m due to have a baby in July. I’m scrambling to find another physician who’s accepting patients; however this is the fourth one I’ve had in 3 years.
